course_title: NRSG 608 Adult/Gerontology Primary Care NP Clinical Practicum III
course_description: This course will provide a clinical practice preceptorship with faculty oversight to develop skills in health assessment and physical exam, differential diagnosis, diagnostic reasoning and plan of care for individual chronic conditions.
prerequisites: NRSG 607 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 5270, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: P. Davis, Status: Open
